text: hananimkkeseo geudeullobuteo ppaeas a geubun-ui seonjija-ege hwan-wonhayeo jusin modeun geos-eun neohuiga geugeos-eul wihae mal-ina nagtalosseo wonjeonghan geos i anigeoneul hananimkkeseo geubun-ui seonjijadeullo hayeogeum geubun-i wonha neun ja wie issdolog gwonneung-eul jusyeoss-euni hananim-eun modeun il-e jeonjijeonneung hasim-ila
